about_the_game:
Celebrity Life gives you the chance to lead a life of the person you probably always wanted to be. Make your dreams come true and try to become a world-known celebrity. Earn money and burn it by buying luxury stuff. Take care of your fans and fight off the rivals. Climb to the top of fame. But be careful with fame comes responsibility, hard work, and tough choices. The fall is often only one step away.

Key Features of Celebrity Life

You probably have thought about what would do with tons of cash if you had it. Don't worry Celebrities have to live on a high level to stay on top. Beautiful clothes, furniture, and other accessories can cost a lot. You can never have too much money. You always need more.

Fight fairly? Not in this business. If you want to have a chance you will cheat, you will lie, you will fake and you will smile. Remember, you don't need to be the best. You just need others to be worse.

There can be only one! One to smash the rivals. One to climb to the top. One, to win. Maybe it's you... maybe not.

Community announcement!

Join other Celebrity fans and take part in voting about 4th profession in-game. YOU decide who will be in the game. Maybe a fashion designer, or football player, boxer or... just use your imagination, and we do it just for YOU!

You'll find voting rules on Steam and discord.

Celebrity Life gives you the chance to lead a life of the person you probably always wanted to be. Make your dreams come true and try to become a world-known celebrity. name: Celebrity Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Happiness, success, fortune, fame, drama, scandals, and downfall. In Celebrity Life you'll experience them all. Take a journey through an immersive reflection of the peoples' lives we follow & talk about. The Celebrities! Now at last you can become one. Don't dream your life, live your dream.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
